site_name: Conway House, 5-6 Ormonde Gate, LONDON, SW3 4EU
description:
Joint Decision and Verification Order required for the renumbering of Conway House, 5-6 Ormonde Gate SW3 4EU following the amalgamation of Flats 1 & 2 at basement and ground floor levels into a single self-contained dwelling unit with its own separate access and post point,  linked to Planning Application CL/12/01591, as follows:
 
Former Flats 1 & 2, Conway House, 5-6 Ormonde Gate SW3 4EU to be deleted and the property to be known as: 

5 Ormonde Gate SW3 4EU
(Separate Post and Access Point)

Flats 3-8, Conway House, 5-6 Ormonde Gate SW3 4EU to be renumbered as: 

Flats 3-8, Conway House, 6 Ormonde Gate SW3 4EU 
(Shared Post and Access Point)

The street address Conway House, 5-6 Ormonde Gate SW3 4EU to be deleted.
